title: List Creative Formats Request
description: Request parameters for discovering supported creative formats

adcp_version.description: AdCP schema version for this request

format_ids.description: Return only these specific format IDs (e.g., from get_products response)

type.description: Filter by format type (technical categories with distinct requirements)

asset_types.description: Filter to formats that include these asset types. For third-party tags, search for 'html' or 'javascript'. E.g., ['image', 'text'] returns formats with images and text, ['javascript'] returns formats accepting JavaScript tags.

dimensions.description: Filter to formats with specific dimensions (e.g., '300x250', '728x90'). Useful with asset_types to find specific sizes like '300x250 JavaScript'

name_search.description: Search for formats by name (case-insensitive partial match)
